official_title: A bill to repeal the provision of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1982 which provides that civil service retirees under age 62 at the time of a cost-of-living adjustment receive only one-half of such adjustment.

summary.text: Repeals specified provisions of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1982 which require reduced cost of living increases in the annuities or retired or retainer pay of Federal retirees who are under 62 years old.
